name: Ladykiller Needs A Twine ~DEMO~
description:
Demo of a personal Twine essay I'm working on, of the visual novel Ladykiller in a Bind and my personal reaction to it as I played.

The full game will be released in 2 weeks time, and will be posted on this page.  Until then, please enjoy the demo!

I'm not 100% sure if this'll fit in the Strawberry Jam, but I figured since it's a game about an adult & kinky game, I'd submit it anyway.  Let me know what you think!  I love hearing people's thoughts on my work.
